name: Hide and Seek DELUXE
description:
15 Levels of Commie-Escaping action! Will you make it to the end?

This lo-fi Atari style horror game will scare your pants off! 

Meet Bolshevik the Communist. He hates American Imperialists with a passion (that's you. He hates you.) Grab the key and escape each room in the Czar's Castle!

Controls:

A-D: Movement

Shift: Run

R: Restart Game
